ygData.subject: New enchanter questions.
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings, I have just started a high elf enchanter on Tunare, having grown tired of my monk, and I have heard many bad things about enchanters.  So, I have a
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings,

I have just started a high elf enchanter on Tunare, having grown
tired of my monk, and I have heard many bad things about enchanters. So,
I have a few questions...

1) Is there a list somewhere of spells that are unimplemented or
just plain worthless? I have heard rumors that the faction adjustment
spells such as Alliance do not actually do anything.

2) I have heard many problems with regards to tougher monsters
resisting spells. Is this only apparent at higher levels? I am currently
5th level, and while my spells are resisted occasionally, I can still affect
red creatures reasonably.

Thanks for your help, in advance. I'm trying to tell if I'm going
to regret the time I spend advancing my character in the long run.

--Fayen, currently of Freeport.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
| Daniel E Andersen | "Life... Love it... |!!!SLEEP!!!|
